name: Thwarting Kolkar Aggression
tooltip:
Thwarting Kolkar Aggression

Lar Prowltusk outside of Sen'jin Village wants you to destroy the 3 sets of Attack Plans held within Kolkar Crag.

Requirements:
- Attack Plan: Valley of Trials destroyed
- Wood Chopper
- Attack Plan: Sen'jin Village destroyed
- Beatstick
- Attack Plan: Orgrimmar destroyed
- Short Bastard Sword
